name: Patio Covers
description: Premium aluminum patio covers for shade and outdoor living. Styles include entry/walkway, awnings, add-a-room, balconies; corner units and side panels available. Straight or curved rafters; wall-mount or roof-mount.
descriptionLong: REVOLU and other Japanese aluminum patio systems from Sankyo-Tateyama. Straight rafters with strong gutter beam; posts can be positioned to suit. Width can be extended seamlessly. Standard width 12'; 18' units available. Typically wall-mounted; roof-mount possible with ledgers and brackets. Panel widths vary by projection (e.g. 36" for 3'–8', 18" for 9'–20'). Shop drawings and structural reports available from Japan.
sizes: Projections: 3' to 20' (REVOLU); panel width 36" for 3'–8', 18" for 9'–20'
Rafter sizes designed for projection; structural reports on request
finishes: Color and finish options; see Product Details on KunkelWorks
priceNote: Pricing by configuration; email specific requirements for quote.
attribution: Product info from KunkelWorks (kunkelworks.com). For details and pricing: info@kunkelworks.com.
